scripts.wipeDatabase: rimraf --glob sequelize.sqlite && rimraf --glob typeorm.sqlite && rimraf --glob prisma/dev.db
scripts.generateDatabase: npx prisma migrate dev && npx ts-node src/sequelizeInit.ts && npx ts-node src/typeormInit.ts
scripts.wipeAndCreate: npm run wipeDatabase && npm run generateDatabase
scripts.timeTest: npm run wipeDatabase && npm run generateDatabase && npx ts-node src/timeBehaviourTesting.ts
scripts.analysabilityTest: npm run wipeDatabase && npm run generateDatabase && npx ts-node src/analysabilityTesting.ts
